alert.note: Alert for Mower (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 4:25PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Mower County through 500 PM CDT... At 425 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brownsdale, or near Austin, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rose Creek around 430 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Sargeant, County Roads 1 And 7, Mapleview, Dexter, Lansing, Mayville, Elkton, Renova and Varco. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 178 and 198. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
